701693f-a.text:
Reservoir Avenue, south side, east from Webb to University Avenues. At the S.E. corner of Webb Avenue is the old Claflin mansion; to its left appears, in part, the Our Lady of Angels Roman Catholic School, and beyond that, the Fort Tower, a 6-story apartment house.

May 6, 1936.

P.L. Sperr.
701693f-a.folder: Reservoir Avenue & Webb Avenue, Bronx, NY

702032f-a.text:
Webb Ave., at the S.E. corner of Reservoir Ave., showing the John
Claflin House.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702032f-a.folder: Webb Avenue & Reservoir Avenue, Bronx, NY
